product_name: Womo Designs Accessory Kit - Garmin Edge Series Bike Computer
long_description: Compatable with the Womo Designs Handlebar Chassis, this Accessory Kit allows the attachment of your Garmin Edge 500 or 800 series bike computer (Garmin Edge sold separately). Mounting hardware is machined out of durable thermoplastic to securely mount accessories without damaging the mating surfaces. Womo Designs Handlebar Chassis required (sold separately); chassis can accept a total of 2 accessories.
short_description: Compatable with the Womo Designs Handlebar Chassis, this Accessory Kit allows the attachment of your Garmin Edge 500 or 800 series bike computer (Garmin Edge sold separately).
